price: አላህ የሰማያትና የምድር ንግሥና ለርሱ ብቻ መኾኑን አታውቅምን? ለእናንተም ከአላህ ሌላ ዘመድና ረዳት ምንም የላችሁም፡፡
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam taʿlam anna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
